  • Method Details

    • fill

      public void fill()
      Fills the user interface with statistical data regarding public apartments. This method sets up the visual representation of the statistics by creating progress bars for each apartment based on the number of votes received. It retrieves statistical information about public apartments from the ApartmentModel and calculates the progress bar values relative to the minimum and maximum number of votes among the apartments. Each progress bar is accompanied by a label displaying the name of the apartment and the ID of the user who owns it. The statistical data is displayed within a ListView component and added to the AnchorPane. Visual styling is applied to enhance the appearance of the progress bars and labels.
      Specified by:
      fill in interface ModeControllerInterface
      See Also:
      • ApartmentModel
      • StatiscticOfApartment
